CustomField.formula: CASE(Status__c , 'New', 'Pending', 'Confirmed', 'Pending', 'In Development', 'Pending', 'In User Validation', 'Pending', 'Waiting for User Response', 'Pending', 'Added to a Project', 'Pending', 'Added to a Release', 'Completed', 'Ready for Stating', 'Completed', 'Closed', 'Completed', 'Merged to Deployment Package', 'Completed', 'Accepted', 'Completed', 'Duplicate/Canceled/Other')
CustomField.label: Current Status
